pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi, H.H. Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Bin Sultan Al-Nahyan | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with the Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi, H.H. Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Bin Sultan Al-Nahyan.

The leaders discussed relations between Canada and the United Arab Emirates as well as ongoing tensions among Gulf states.  

Prime Minister Trudeau raised Canadaâ€™s interest in seeing a reduction of friction amongst Gulf partners and the importance of maintaining stability within the region. 

The Prime Minister noted the value of retaining open lines of communication and dialogue within the Gulf Cooperation Council to collectively reduce the financing of terrorism and extremism, regardless of where it occurs. 

During the discussion, the leaders agreed on the fundamental compatibility between Islam and progressive values, and  committed to keep working together to create new opportunities for Canadian and Emirati citizens alike.
